meta.description: Transform your nutrition with LOWIS. 13-phase system with AI + expert monitoring, 17+ health indicators, adapted to Moroccan cuisine. 7-day free trial.

steps.title: Follow your personalized plan

items.question: Does the app really recognize Moroccan dishes?
items.answer: Yes! Our database includes over 500 Moroccan dishes and ingredients: tajines, couscous, pastilla, harira, msemen, baghrir, and much more. Each recipe has been analyzed for its exact nutritional values.

items.question: How does the 7-day free trial work?
items.answer: You have access to all Premium features for 7 days, without providing your credit card. At the end of the trial, you can continue at 149 DH/month or simply do nothing.

items.question: How do you track 17+ health indicators?
items.answer: Every day, you answer a few quick questions about your sleep, energy, digestion, mood, etc. In 30 seconds, we understand how you feel and adapt recommendations.

items.question: Does the app work offline?
items.answer: Absolutely. LOWIS is a PWA designed for Morocco where connection can be unstable. Everything works offline and syncs automatically.

items.question: What's the difference with other apps?
items.answer: LOWIS combines AI + real expert monitoring. It's not just a calorie calculator. It's a 13-phase scientific system with weekly evaluation, adapted to Moroccan cuisine and Ramadan.

items.question: How does it work during Ramadan?
items.answer: We have special plans for fasting with optimal distribution between ftour and shour. The app automatically adapts to your rhythm during the holy month.

items.question: Can I cancel anytime?
items.answer: Yes, one-click cancellation from the app. You keep access until the end of your paid period.

items.question: Can I really lose 1 kg/week?
items.answer: That's the goal of our protocol. Results vary based on your profile and program adherence. Our experts adjust your plan every week to optimize your results.
